name: Enhanced style for Sortd Smart Skin for Gmail
description: Column headers were changed from uppercase to lowercase. Letter spacing in task descriptions was made slightly wider. Background colours for tasks changed to a coloured 5px left bar. Colour picker now shows a black border on mouse hover. Follow-up icon was changed from grey to red. In the Today view the background colours were changed from white into light yellow and light blue.
